name: Ashton - Symmetry - Belicoso
additionalNotes: Ashton Symmetry tantalizes the senses with a stunning and complex profile. Legendary cigar-maker Carlito Fuente blends Ashton Symmetry from an intricate interior of premium Dominican and Nicaraguan long-fillers tucked under an ultra-rare Habano Rosado wrapper leaf grown in Ecuador. Exquisite notes of cedar, cinnamon, coffee bean, and Turkish fig weave a hearty tapestry of flavor over the palate throughout a delicious finish punctuated by ample hints of black pepper.Â
